description.zh-cn: 清朝宗室、外藩中内扎萨克的第一等爵位。宗室之中唯皇子、皇兄弟可以获得此爵位。
description.en: The highest rank of peerage for members of the imperial clan and inner Jasagh Mongol nobility during the Qing dynasty. Within the imperial clan, only the emperor's sons and brothers could receive this title.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上由满族建立的统一王朝，也是中国最后一个封建帝制国家。
description.en: The last imperial dynasty of China, established by the Manchu people.

description.zh-cn: 后金第二位大汗，清朝的开国皇帝。
description.en: The second Khan of the Later Jin and the founding emperor of the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国大陆时期军事人物，于1924年发动北京政变，驱逐清朝末代皇帝溥仪，终结了清室优待条件。
description.en: A military leader during the Republic of China era who launched the Beijing Coup in 1924, expelled the last Qing emperor Puyi, and terminated the Articles of Favorable Treatment for the Qing Imperial House.

en: Articles of Favorable Treatment of the Great Qing Emperor, After His Abdication

description.zh-cn: 中华民国临时政府在清帝逊位后，承诺并给予清皇室的优待条件。该条件于1924年被冯玉祥终结。
description.en: The favorable terms promised to the Qing imperial house by the Provisional Government of the Republic of China after the emperor's abdication. These terms were terminated by Feng Yuxiang in 1924.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第三位皇帝，清朝入关后的首位皇帝。
description.en: The third emperor of the Qing dynasty and the first Qing emperor to rule over China proper.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第六位皇帝，在位六十年。
description.en: The sixth emperor of the Qing dynasty, who reigned for sixty years.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第五位皇帝。
description.en: The fifth emperor of the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第八位皇帝。
description.en: The eighth emperor of the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 清朝世袭罔替的王爵，俗称铁帽子王，始封于代善。中间曾被改为巽、康封号。
description.en: A hereditary princely peerage of the Qing dynasty, one of the 'iron-cap' princes, first bestowed upon Daišan. The designation was temporarily changed to Xun and Kang.

description.zh-cn: 清朝宗室，皇太极的二哥，第一代礼亲王。
description.en: A member of the Qing imperial clan, the second older brother of Hong Taiji, and the first Prince Li.

description.zh-cn: 清朝宗室，第二代礼亲王（时为巽亲王）。
description.en: A member of the Qing imperial clan, the second Prince Li (then Prince Xun).

description.zh-cn: 清朝宗室，第三代礼亲王（时为巽亲王），后被革爵。
description.en: A member of the Qing imperial clan, the third Prince Li (then Prince Xun), later stripped of his title.

description.zh-cn: 清朝宗室，第四代礼亲王（时为康亲王）。
description.en: A member of the Qing imperial clan, the fourth Prince Li (then Prince Kang).

description.zh-cn: 清朝宗室，第五代礼亲王（时为康亲王）。
description.en: A member of the Qing imperial clan, the fifth Prince Li (then Prince Kang).

description.zh-cn: 清朝宗室，第六代礼亲王（时为康亲王）。
description.en: A member of the Qing imperial clan, the sixth Prince Li (then Prince Kang).

description.zh-cn: 清朝宗室，第七代礼亲王（时为康亲王）。
description.en: A member of the Qing imperial clan, the seventh Prince Li (then Prince Kang).

description.zh-cn: 清朝宗室，第八代礼亲王。
description.en: A member of the Qing imperial clan, the eighth Prince Li.

description.zh-cn: 清朝宗室，第九代礼亲王，后被革爵。
description.en: A member of the Qing imperial clan, the ninth Prince Li, later stripped of his title.

description.zh-cn: 清朝宗室，第十代礼亲王。
description.en: A member of the Qing imperial clan, the tenth Prince Li.

description.zh-cn: 清朝宗室，第十一代礼亲王。
description.en: A member of the Qing imperial clan, the eleventh Prince Li.

description.zh-cn: 清朝宗室，第十二代礼亲王。
description.en: A member of the Qing imperial clan, the twelfth Prince Li.

description.zh-cn: 清朝宗室，第十三代礼亲王。
description.en: A member of the Qing imperial clan, the thirteenth Prince Li.

description.zh-cn: 清朝宗室，末代礼亲王。
description.en: A member of the Qing imperial clan, the last Prince Li.

description.zh-cn: 清朝世袭罔替的王爵，俗称铁帽子王，始封于多尔衮。后被剥夺，于乾隆四十三年恢复。
description.en: A hereditary princely peerage of the Qing dynasty, one of the 'iron-cap' princes, first bestowed upon Dorgon. The title was later revoked and restored in the 43rd year of the Qianlong era.

description.zh-cn: 清朝宗室，皇太极的十四弟，第一代睿亲王，后被顺治帝剥夺封号。
description.en: A member of the Qing imperial clan, the fourteenth younger brother of Hong Taiji, and the first Prince Rui. His titles were posthumously stripped by the Shunzhi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 清朝宗室，乾隆四十三年承袭睿亲王爵位。
description.en: A member of the Qing imperial clan who inherited the title of Prince Rui in the 43rd year of the Qianlong era.

description.zh-cn: 清朝世袭罔替的王爵，俗称铁帽子王，始封于多铎。
description.en: A hereditary princely peerage of the Qing dynasty, one of the 'iron-cap' princes, first bestowed upon Dodo.

description.zh-cn: 清朝宗室，皇太极的十五弟，第一代豫亲王。
description.en: A member of the Qing imperial clan, the fifteenth younger brother of Hong Taiji, and the first Prince Yu.

description.zh-cn: 清朝世袭罔替的王爵，俗称铁帽子王，始封于豪格。中间曾被改为显字封号。
description.en: A hereditary princely peerage of the Qing dynasty, one of the 'iron-cap' princes, first bestowed upon Hooge. The designation was temporarily changed to Xian.

description.zh-cn: 清朝宗室，皇太极的长子，第一代肃亲王。
description.en: A member of the Qing imperial clan, the eldest son of Hong Taiji, and the first Prince Su.

description.zh-cn: 清朝世袭罔替的王爵，俗称铁帽子王，始封于济尔哈朗。中间曾被改为简字封号。
description.en: A hereditary princely peerage of the Qing dynasty, one of the 'iron-cap' princes, first bestowed upon Jirgalang. The designation was temporarily changed to Jian.

description.zh-cn: 清朝宗室，皇太极的侄儿，第一代郑亲王。
description.en: A member of the Qing imperial clan, a nephew of Hong Taiji, and the first Prince Zheng.

description.zh-cn: 清朝世袭罔替的王爵，俗称铁帽子王，始封于硕塞（时为承泽亲王）。
description.en: A hereditary princely peerage of the Qing dynasty, one of the 'iron-cap' princes, first bestowed upon Šose (as Prince Chengze).

description.zh-cn: 清朝宗室，皇太极的五子，第一代庄亲王（始封承泽亲王）。
description.en: A member of the Qing imperial clan, the fifth son of Hong Taiji, and the first Prince Zhuang (initially as Prince Chengze).

description.zh-cn: 清朝世袭罔替的王爵，俗称铁帽子王，始封于胤祥。
description.en: A hereditary princely peerage of the Qing dynasty, one of the 'iron-cap' princes, first bestowed upon Yinxiang.

description.zh-cn: 清朝宗室，雍正帝的十三弟，第一代怡亲王。
description.en: A member of the Qing imperial clan, the thirteenth younger brother of the Yongzheng Emperor, and the first Prince Yi.

description.zh-cn: 清朝世袭罔替的王爵，俗称铁帽子王，始封于奕䜣。
description.en: A hereditary princely peerage of the Qing dynasty, one of the 'iron-cap' princes, first bestowed upon Yixin.

description.zh-cn: 清朝宗室，道光帝六子，第一代恭亲王。
description.en: A member of the Qing imperial clan, the sixth son of the Daoguang Emperor, and the first Prince Gong.

description.zh-cn: 清朝世袭罔替的王爵，俗称铁帽子王，始封于奕𫍽。
description.en: A hereditary princely peerage of the Qing dynasty, one of the 'iron-cap' princes, first bestowed upon Yixuan.

description.zh-cn: 清朝宗室，道光帝七子，第一代醇亲王。
description.en: A member of the Qing imperial clan, the seventh son of the Daoguang Emperor, and the first Prince Chun.

description.zh-cn: 清朝世袭罔替的王爵，俗称铁帽子王，始封于奕劻。
description.en: A hereditary princely peerage of the Qing dynasty, one of the 'iron-cap' princes, first bestowed upon Yikuang.

description.zh-cn: 清朝宗室，乾隆帝曾孙，第一代庆亲王。
description.en: A member of the Qing imperial clan, a great-grandson of the Qianlong Emperor, and the first Prince Qing.

description.zh-cn: 清朝宗室，第二代醇亲王，末代皇帝溥仪之父。
description.en: A member of the Qing imperial clan, the second Prince Chun, and father of the last emperor, Puyi.

description.zh-cn: 清朝宗室，第二代恭亲王。
description.en: A member of the Qing imperial clan, the second Prince Gong.

description.zh-cn: 清朝宗室，第二代庆亲王。
description.en: A member of the Qing imperial clan, the second Prince Qing.

description.zh-cn: 清太宗皇太极仿明建制时于亲王前加号“和硕”，以示尊崇。
description.en: The Hong Taiji Emperor, imitating the Ming system, added the title 'Hošoi' before 'Cin Wang' (Prince) to signify high honor.

description.zh-cn: 冯玉祥发动北京政变，终结了清室优待条件。
description.en: Feng Yuxiang launched the Beijing Coup and terminated the Articles of Favorable Treatment for the Qing Imperial House.

description.zh-cn: 1924年清室优待条件被终结，标志着和硕亲王这一爵位制度的正式结束。
description.en: The termination of the Articles of Favorable Treatment in 1924 marked the official end of the 'Hošoi cin wang' peerage system.

description.zh-cn: 顺治七年（1650年），多尔衮死后被顺治帝剥夺封号。
description.en: In the 7th year of the Shunzhi era (1650), after Dorgon's death, his titles were posthumously stripped by the Shunzhi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 乾隆四十三年（1778年），乾隆帝下旨允许淳颖承袭世袭罔替的睿亲王爵位。
description.en: In the 43rd year of the Qianlong era (1778), the Qianlong Emperor decreed that Chunying could inherit the hereditary Prince Rui title.

description.zh-cn: 代善是皇太极的二哥。
description.en: Daišan was Hong Taiji's second older brother.

position.en: Prince Li (Lie) of the First Rank
Prince Xun (Jian) of the First Rank
Prince Xun of the First Rank (revoked)

description.zh-cn: 多尔衮是皇太极的十四弟。
description.en: Dorgon was Hong Taiji's fourteenth younger brother.

position.en: Prince Rui (Zhong) of the First Rank
Prince Rui (Gong) of the First Rank

description.zh-cn: 多铎是皇太极的十五弟。
description.en: Dodo was Hong Taiji's fifteenth younger brother.

position.en: Prince Yu (Tong) of the First Rank

description.zh-cn: 豪格是皇太极的长子。
description.en: Hooge was Hong Taiji's eldest son.

position.en: Prince Su (Wu) of the First Rank

description.zh-cn: 济尔哈朗是皇太极的侄儿。
description.en: Jirgalang was Hong Taiji's nephew.

position.en: Prince Zheng (Xian) of the First Rank

description.zh-cn: 硕塞是皇太极的五子。
description.en: Šose was Hong Taiji's fifth son.

position.en: Prince Chengze (Yu) of the First Rank

description.zh-cn: 胤祥是雍正帝的十三弟。
description.en: Yinxiang was the Yongzheng Emperor's thirteenth younger brother.

position.en: Prince Yi (Xian) of the First Rank

description.zh-cn: 奕䜣是道光帝的六子。
description.en: Yixin was the Daoguang Emperor's sixth son.

position.en: Prince Gong (Zhong) of the First Rank
Prince Gong (Xian) of the First Rank

description.zh-cn: 奕𫍽是道光帝的七子。
description.en: Yixuan was the Daoguang Emperor's seventh son.

position.en: Prince Chun (Xian) of the First Rank
Prince Chun of the First Rank

description.zh-cn: 奕劻是乾隆帝的曾孙。
description.en: Yikuang was the Qianlong Emperor's great-grandson.

position.en: Prince Qing (Mi) of the First Rank
Prince Qing (Zhen) of the First Rank
